alert.note: Alert for Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 6:24PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Leon County through 715 PM EDT... At 624 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near St. Marks, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Florida A And M, Florida State University, Doak Campbell Stadium, Ralford Greenway, Macon Community Park, Gaither Community Center, Lake Munson, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Eight Mile Pond, Chaires, Lake Ella, Tallahassee Mall, State Capital Complex, Governors Square Mall, Natural Bridge, Springsax Park, Belair and Apalachee Regional Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
